remarks: Value of composition in the binary product of categories.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 11-Jan-2017.)
statement:
xpccofval.t $e |- T = ( C Xc. D ) $.
xpccofval.b $e |- B = ( Base ` T ) $.
xpccofval.k $e |- K = ( Hom ` T ) $.
xpccofval.o1 $e |- .x. = ( comp ` C ) $.
xpccofval.o2 $e |- .xb = ( comp ` D ) $.

xpcco.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
xpcco.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
xpcco.z $e |- ( ph -> Z e. B ) $.
xpcco.f $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( X K Y ) ) $.
xpcco.g $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( Y K Z ) ) $.
xpcco $p |- ( ph -> ( G ( <. X , Y >. O Z ) F ) = <. ( ( 1st ` G ) ( <. ( 1st ` X ) , ( 1st ` Y ) >. .x. ( 1st ` Z ) ) ( 1st ` F ) ) , ( ( 2nd ` G ) ( <. ( 2nd ` X ) , ( 2nd ` Y ) >. .xb ( 2nd ` Z ) ) ( 2nd ` F ) ) >. ) $.
